courses.title: Frontend Foundations
courses.description: HTML, CSS, and JavaScript essentials to build real interfaces.
courses.lessonBody: In this lesson, you'll build a simple responsive layout using flexible grids, spacing, and accessible UI patterns. Focus on consistency: typography scale, spacing rhythm, and states (hover/focus/active).

courses.title: DSA for Problem Solving
courses.description: Core data structures and patterns for coding interviews and contests.
courses.lessonBody: Two pointers is a mindset: move boundaries based on conditions. Start with sorted arrays (or sort first), define invariants, and prove correctness.

courses.title: Git & Career Workflow
courses.description: Practical Git, project planning, and portfolio-ready habits.
courses.lessonBody: A good commit message explains why. Prefer short summaries, include context, and keep changes logically grouped. Your future self will thank you.
